subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: As talks continue over whether N.H.L. players will go to the Sochi Games, there is concern that other leagues may ask the I.O.C. for the same concessions.
snippet: As talks continue over whether N.H.L. players will go to the Sochi Games, there is concern that other leagues may ask the I.O.C. for the same concessions.
